analysis.description:
CNRToken.takeICOInvestmentsEtherCommission (/unique_chucks/38/0x3baa300530b7104b8fd4ee82ea155d26476de164.sol#216-242) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-BeneficiaryInterface(ico_token_address).withdrawInvestmentsBeneficiary(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3baa300530b7104b8fd4ee82ea155d26476de164.sol#241-242)

CNRToken.withdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/38/0x3baa300530b7104b8fd4ee82ea155d26476de164.sol#300-322) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20Basic(_token_address).transfer(_destination_address,token_balance) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3baa300530b7104b8fd4ee82ea155d26476de164.sol#320-322)

CNRToken.getAvailableEtherCommissions has external calls inside a loop:
	- available_withdraws[i - 1] = BeneficiaryInterface(tokens_arr[i].contract_address).getAvailableWithdrawInvestmentsForBeneficiary() (/unique_chucks/38/0x3baa300530b7104b8fd4ee82ea155d26476de164.sol#196-202)

Reentrancy in CNRToken.takeICOInvestmentsEtherCommission (/unique_chucks/38/0x3baa300530b7104b8fd4ee82ea155d26476de164.sol#216-242):
	External calls:
	- available_investments_commission = BeneficiaryInterface(ico_token_address).getAvailableWithdrawInvestmentsForBeneficiary() (/unique_chucks/38/0x3baa300530b7104b8fd4ee82ea155d26476de164.sol#224-226)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokens_arr (/unique_chucks/38/0x3baa300530b7104b8fd4ee82ea155d26476de164.sol#233-236)
Platform.platform should be constant (/unique_chucks/38/0x3baa300530b7104b8fd4ee82ea155d26476de164.sol#6-8)
Platform.isPlatform (/unique_chucks/38/0x3baa300530b7104b8fd4ee82ea155d26476de164.sol#13-19) should be declared external
